frameset.edef: subscribe, like a magazine subscription, or belief system

arg.g: In Jubail water services in Lashfa

example.arg: في مصلحة مياه جبيل ل لشفة

arg.g: but the water was disconnected for more than 3 months

example.arg: لكن المياه لم تصل *-1 ني ل أكثر من ثلاثة اشهر
